text: So itll appear as "pick up now" too

Except that about 80% of the jobs are food delivery. Harder to earn if you avoid food delivery totally.
I read no commission don't know true or not

"No commission" model they take it off the vendor's side  like grabpandaroo. llm can easily show us a "delivery fee" without showing how much they are charging the vendor  which would make it look like "no commission" also.

No table  but office chairs cant stack de  how to fit 1.7 vanüòÇü§£
Just tell them find moving services
I tell them I not their luck
No he mean my max weight for goods is 400kg as stated on llm
Don't spoil market  ask customer click on 'find another driver'
Only see wat they want to see. What abt dimensions ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇ
Van no limit  can stack till brim
Mpv n below has dimensions limits
Just take photo etc as proof. If kena suspend then show llm lor. If they still want suspend then tell them will post it online with the suspension punishment. Give llm free publicity
Last time I kena 1 send plants
Because of no limits  some people abuse  got one put 'till full capacity'  so i pay bus tard say they no hire me as mover so they diy loüòÇ
For decoration. I reach the person show me
Got 3 potted. Almost taller than me. I almost 1.9m
Plants must see how many pots n weight  some need minimum 2 person to carry
I tell her how u want me fit in car
She say last time got another car can smaller than mine
Ask her call that driver lo
I say I cannot fit in. Sorry. Pls cancel. She lan lan. I take photo etc
all vehicles got weight n dimemsion limits  up to and including 14ft lorry. van is 160x120x100cm or 230x120x120cm. in the app pricing details.
Nxt thing I know she complain. Llm want suspend me. I email not use cs. Told them I have all the proof etc  suspend me for f***. If want suspend I will not take it quietly. Then they no suspend me
Llm is like that 1. If u quiet just let them tekkan they tekkan.
If u not wrong don't scared talk back. Use the right channels but don't guailan talk or what lah
Got few occasions i took mpv jobs  items exceeded dimensions or weight i counter suggested +$10-$15 they ok de
Think is ur van can put
My car want put also cannot
So cannot ask them give me extra i deliverüòÇ
Yah  cannot blur blur kena for nothing
Alot of pple think we delivery pple  either is gong kia  or desperate need the $  uneducated  can bully
Can but must pay 'Van' fee  not lowballer mpvüòÇ
Cannot let them keep on bullyüòÇ

N to those newbies who join. It's no that I'm mean or unfriendly  but I see alot of things u all ask. Like where best to do job etc. We do delivery is to earn  where got just tell u all where good etc? We all go thru noob phase  experience ourselves n learn n slowly do. Who so good will share everything just cos u all new and ask? Then we eat what? Go out try everything urself then u learn  n what u learn will stick with u.

N I also see alot newbie ask  this job is what  any1 do b4  can do? Etc? Come on. 1stly u all think we do everything b4 ah. And also think this job so easy ah? Don't need go try 1 ah? Machiam sit down pple feed ah? Then whole population do liao. No effort no reward pls.

If u all see  we chat on the channel mostly is say the bad experience n what to do if kena. That already very good help liao. Still want know all the good job  good place  which job can do etc. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇ
All the good apples we keep ourselves  where got drop to the floor for you allüòÇ
